name: R5-GuidePageGeneration-R4-GuidePageGeneration
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 GuidePageGeneration into a FHIR R4 GuidePageGeneration

element.display: Page will be generated by the publication process - no source to bring across.

target.display: Page will be generated by the publication process - no source to bring across.

element.display: Page is proper xhtml with no templating.  Will be brought across unchanged for standard post-processing.

target.display: Page is proper xhtml with no templating.  Will be brought across unchanged for standard post-processing.

element.display: Page is markdown with templating.  Will use the template to create a file that imports the markdown file prior to post-processing.

target.display: Page is markdown with templating.  Will use the template to create a file that imports the markdown file prior to post-processing.

element.display: Page is xml with templating.  Will use the template to create a file that imports the source file and run the nominated XSLT transform (see parameters) if present prior to post-processing.

target.display: Page is xml with templating.  Will use the template to create a file that imports the source file and run the nominated XSLT transform (see parameters) if present prior to post-processing.
